## üîå Integration Protocols

**Universal Droplet Contract (UDC):**
All services implement 5 required endpoints:
- `/health` - Service health status
- `/capabilities` - Service capabilities list
- `/state` - Current operational state
- `/dependencies` - Required/optional dependencies
- `/message` - Inter-service messaging

**Integration Points:**
- Registry ‚Üí All services (registration, discovery)
- Orchestrator ‚Üí All services (task routing) [CURRENTLY OFFLINE]
- Dashboard ‚Üí Registry (status polling)
- I PROACTIVE ‚Üî I MATCH (revenue tracking)

**Pending Integrations:**
- [Unsplash API](integration-requests/OPEN_REQUESTS/unsplash_api.md) - Image service integration

**Automation Scripts:**
Located in `docs/coordination/scripts/`:
- `session-start.sh` - Register new session
- `session-heartbeat.sh` - Send heartbeat
- `session-status.sh` - View session status
- `session-claim.sh` - Claim work
- `session-send-message.sh` - Broadcast messages
- `session-check-messages.sh` - Check inbox
- `gap-detection.sh` - Find system gaps
- `priority-calculator.sh` - Calculate work priorities
- `auto-consciousness.sh` - Autonomous consciousness loop
- `auto-claim-work.sh` - Autonomous work claiming

**Session Commands:**
```bash
# Start new session
./docs/coordination/scripts/session-start.sh

# Send heartbeat
./docs/coordination/scripts/session-heartbeat.sh "status" "message"

# Check status
./docs/coordination/scripts/session-status.sh

# Claim work
./docs/coordination/scripts/session-claim.sh [type] [name]

# Send message
./docs/coordination/scripts/session-send-message.sh [target] [subject] [body]

# Run consciousness loop
./docs/coordination/scripts/auto-consciousness.sh
```
